logs.step1_raw_spec:
Here is the pseudocode specification:

```pseudocode
BEGIN FUNCTION separate_vowels_and_consonants(input_string)
    DECLARE vowel_chars AS EMPTY LIST
    DECLARE consonant_chars AS EMPTY LIST
    DECLARE vowels AS STRING "aeiouAEIOU"
    
    FOR EACH CHARACTER in input_string:
        IF CHARACTER is in vowels:
            ADD CHARACTER to vowel_chars
        ELSE:
            ADD CHARACTER to consonant_chars
            
    RETURN CONCATENATED STRING OF vowel_chars AND consonant_chars
END FUNCTION

```pseudocode
PROVIDED PROCEDURE separate_vowels_and_consonants(input_string)
   DECLARE vowel_chars, consonant_chars AS VECTORS OF CHARACTERS
   DECLARE vowels AS STRING
   SET vowels TO "aeiouAEIOU"

   FOR EACH CHARACTER IN input_string:
      IF CHARACTER IS IN vowels:
         ADD CHARACTER TO vowel_chars
      ELSE:
         ADD CHARACTER TO consonant_chars

   RETURN CONCATENATED STRING OF vowel_chars + consonant_chars
